description: In the stark, icy landscape of Antarctica, a figure on skis launches dramatically into the air from a crudely formed snow ramp. Below, another figure on snowshoes stands with outstretched arms, celebrating their arrival. The irony lies in the jubilant declaration of being at the "bottom of the world" while one person is unexpectedly catapulted upwards. This absurd scene blends the extreme environment with a surreal, unexpected act of vertical ascent. The bizarre ski jump and the juxtaposition of location and action highlight the panel's dark humor and sense of disorientation.
caption: “We’re here, Eric! Antarctica! … Bottom of the world!”
